inclusion.criterion: patients evaluated in the Emergency Department for loss of consciousness
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: loss of consciousness classified as high risk syncope
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: identification of cause of loss of consciousness after initial evaluation
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: loss of consciousness classified as high risk syncope
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has carotid bruits and significant bilateral carotid stenosis, but no residual deficits from prior CVA. He denies chest pain, dyspnea on exertion, or other symptoms that would make him ineligible.
